body:
Obviously, you can see i care about avicus alot and alot of the players are leaving. half of them just think the server is bad, and the other have life stuff or are raging. The point is, people are leaving about 3 a day and the forum is filled with posts like "leaving" and "Quitting". I am just asking how can i and some others help get a higher player count? I just dont want to see the server go down when, when you join and everybody is socializing, and many friendships would be ruined. I just want to healp

sincerely

Rattle
body_tagged:
Obviously, you can see i care about avicus alot and alot of the players are leaving. half of them just think the server is bad, and the other have life stuff or are raging. The point is, people are leaving about 3 a day and the forum is filled with posts like "leaving" and "Quitting". I am just asking how can i and some others help get a higher player count? I just dont want to see the server go down when, when you join and everybody is socializing, and many friendships would be ruined. I just want to healp

sincerely

Rattle
title: How do we get more players

replies.body: Don't allow players to make "goodbye" threads tbh that's unnecessary if you are quitting let only your good friends know!
replies.body_tagged: Don't allow players to make "goodbye" threads tbh that's unnecessary if you are quitting let only your good friends know!

replies.body:
BIG TIME IDEAS:

1) Quickest solution is for everyone to create an alt and log on. So when you're playing always have your alt on too! Problem solved! Double the player count immediately.

2) To counter the 'leaving post', every time you see one, create an "I'm staying" post, so we can clutter up the forums more. Put more positivity in the forums!

3) We need a "Bring a Friend" Day! Do raffle for credits or rank for anyone that logged on for the first time that day!

4) Have a Walls Event! That will bring players in droves! First, you need to fix the xml on most of the walls maps, but it can be done!

5) Do some sort of random prize drawing for those new announcements at the end of the game.  "Murphh got the most kills this match - 3 kills".  Have players post proof of announcement on forums that their name was mentioned and then give them prizes.  Prize: Map dev for a day (you pick rotations on one servers), 

6) Add a new rank "FRIEND OF AVICUS" - FOA, for anyone who logs on for more than 4 hours per week.

3) We need a "Bring a Friend" Day! Do raffle for credits or rank for anyone that logged on for the first time that day!

4) Have a Walls Event! That will bring players in droves! First, you need to fix the xml on most of the walls maps, but it can be done!

5) Do some sort of random prize drawing for those new announcements at the end of the game.  "Murphh got the most kills this match - 3 kills".  Have players post proof of announcement on forums that their name was mentioned and then give them prizes.  Prize: Map dev for a day (you pick rotations on one servers), 

6) Add a new rank "FRIEND OF AVICUS" - FOA, for anyone who logs on for more than 4 hours per week.

replies.body:
Referral Code:

Players who use a code get a one day gold rank, but can never use another code again. The code owner recieves a commission or gets closer to a reward of some sort such as 1-month gold rank or something. Basically you have the players do the advertising for you, and in return they get a commission/reward.

Basically you have the players do the advertising for you, and in return they get a commission/reward.

replies.body:
Well i mean

literally for as far back as probably about 2 years ago

people have said 'its more important to keep old players than to get new ones'

but where has that got the server?

nothing worth playing for has come out since the implementation of badges which many people didnt find fun grinding for

old players are leaving because tbh minecraft is a near dead game, pvp wise anyway. The updates have made pvp trash and its just not fun to play anymore

people move onto other games that offer new experiences 

personally i havent been on for a while so i dont knownwhat the current sitstuion is but for a long time, like seriously long, there were no new maps, gamemodes,anything 

ik this is minecraft and these comparisons are wayyyyy different to avicus' situation, but if you havent notcied, people love change, thats a large part of the reason that certain (retarded) decisions happened recently in the real world. People were bored of the same old same old


but honestly who's gonna want to come to a server and play where it has like 20-50 people on max? You might aswell go play badlion or uhc even if avicus does offer a different meta than theyre used to

gl avicus but i dont see this around at the end of the summer

please prove me wrong

replies.body:
Keenan has made is pretty clear that Prestiges aren't coming back. (Although I think he might be willing to at some point, if the servers gets to the point where there's 10 people on at max.) 
So some suggestions could be:

-Find a new money system. Credits honestly suck. They are pointless to try to get, and even if you were trying to get them, what are you going to buy? A badge that isn't all that amazing, a morph that you can only use in the hub, where no one is for more then 2 minutes... A sound effect, that doesn't really do anything for you, and costs a lot of Credits. None of these are even close to spending 7 hours grinding to try to get. Find something that's worth it.

-A leveling system that can be infinite. I'm not sure if this is possible, but from what I understand the reason Prestiges were removed was because it was too hard to update to keep up with how fast people were leveling up. If there's a way to make it infinite, then this wouldn't be a problem, and this could be possible to bring back.

-Keep. Your. Promises. Please.
     *In the past few months there have been a few different things that have been "Yes, we will add *insert thing            here* and it never happens. One of those being the "Walls at the end of Mix rotations." That still hasn't                    happened. I'm not sure if it just became not possible for the Developers to do or what, but when the                      community votes and you say "Yes, we will add this" Please do. It just makes the server look like we can't                keep up with updates, or keep our promises.

-From what I've heard, a lot of updates don't happen because the Devs "don't want to". That's really not an excuse when you're working as a developer. You're here to developer stuff. Please do. (When it's pointless, I understand. When it's an actual problem that everyone is complaining about, it clearly needs to be fixed. So fix it.)

-The community could not blame everything on the Moderators, maybe? The Moderators don't have any power to update or change anything within the server. They are simply there to get rid to hackers and keep the server a peaceful place. It's just annoying to spam them about "THE SERVER IS BROKEN FIX IT".

replies.body: There's a way, I know it. Make people somehow interested. - Call a youtuber like SSundee in or someone, or a more PVP style youtuber like DjTasty.

replies.body: as i said before i had a talk with crazy and this was one of the things that we talked about, i was giving him ideas and forms to improve the server but he told me something that its true '' there is just one active developer ALM'' and is active but not that much, u cant just say do this do that when there is just one developer
